name: Vishal Tyagi
title: Flutter Developer | Full Stack & IoT Engineer

experience.title: Flutter & IoT Engineer (Internship)
description: Leading the redevelopment of a comprehensive inventory management system using Flutter for cross-platform application development, Express for backend services, and MongoDB for efficient data management.
Developed an innovative system for remote monitoring and management of poultry farms using Flutter, allowing authorized industry professionals to oversee operations from remote locations.
Gained expertise in Siemens and Delta PLCs, setting up and working with simulators and data blocks, enhancing industrial automation capabilities.
Worked with IoT networks and protocols, including OPC UA client, Node-RED, and Cloudflare Tunnel.

experience.title: Mobile Application Developer & ML Engineer (Freelance)
description: Led the redesign of the My Dua app for Ramadan using Flutter, incorporating advanced features for music playback and religious functions, enhancing user engagement and app functionality.
Contributed to the development of a Flutter-based attendance management project, improving workforce management capabilities for clients.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer (Internship)
experience.company: Panipat Institute of Engineering and Technology
description: Developed and maintained comprehensive college portals, including a feedback portal and the RISE portal, enhancing student-faculty interaction and administrative efficiency.
Created an advanced exam portal with sophisticated cheating detection features, dynamic random question set creation, and order changing based on detected cheating patterns.
Implemented robust automation scripts for downloading feedback reports and uploading questions.
Developed a comprehensive ticketing system integrated with HDFC Bank for secure payments and Interakt for WhatsApp API.
Built the Kaun Banega Entrepreneur (KBE) web application for hosting engaging quiz competitions.
Developed a real-time bus route tracking and attendance application, enhancing transportation management and student safety.

projects.name: Smart Irrigation System
projects.description: Developed a smart irrigation system app using NodeMCU and sensors to monitor temperature, humidity, and soil moisture. The Flutter app visualizes real-time data and forecasts irrigation needs with an SVM model.

projects.name: Crickiaa - A Gully Cricket Flutter UI App
projects.description: Developed a Flutter UI app for managing and tracking gully cricket matches, providing a user-friendly interface for scorekeeping and team management.

openSourceContributions.name: Floor Plan Builder
openSourceContributions.description: Flutter package for creating interactive floor plans with customizable tables.

openSourceContributions.name: image hotspot
openSourceContributions.description: Flutter package for adding interactive hotspots to images.

hackathons.project: Created TeenSage, a chatbot focused on sex education for teenagers
